Contributor: Dorival, Géo, b. 1879, artist.; Capon, G., artist.; Commission Américaine de Préservation contre la Tuberculose en France, publisher.;
Note: Signed "G. Capon" and "Geo Dorival." "Visa 14.346" appears on the bottom left of the poster. "Editions de "L'Art et la Mode" -- Bottom right. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text in French tells of the other danger, which is tuberculosis. It must be vanquished. Illustration shows a green hand holding a string which is attached to a knife marked "La Tuberculose."
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Publisher: Place of publication not identified : Commission Américaine de Préservation contre la Tuberculose en France,
